name: Evolution Surge
book: Advanced Player's Guide. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions as lesser evolution surge (see below), except that you can grant any evolution whose total cost does not exceed 4 evolution points.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 类似于次级激励进化 (Evolution Surge, Lesser)，但是你能给予一项不超过四点进化点的进化。
